Fargo.Comstock House:
The Comstock House is a historic house museum in Moorhead, Minnesota, United States. It is the restored home of U.S. Congressman and businessman Solomon Comstock with its original furnishings.The house is run by a partnership between the Minnesota Historical Society and the Historical and Cultural Society of Clay County.
The house has two stories and eleven rooms and was designed by architecture firm Kees and Fisk.
